input_text:
Job Title: Housekeeper I

Location: Muscatine, IA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Overview

Housekeeper I

Full Time; FTE 1.0

1st Shift; 6:30am-3:00pm

Muscatine, IA

Performs work of routine difficulty in a variety of cleaning tasks that involve use of hazardous chemicals, heavy lifting, and exposure to patients (including blood and body fluids). Daily cleaning of patient rooms (plus transfer and discharge), and precaution room cleaning. Completes a variety of set-ups and special events per departmental requests.

Why UnityPoint Health?

Culture – At UnityPoint Health, you Come for a fulfilling career and experience a culture guided by uncompromising values and unwavering belief in doing what's right for the people we serve.Benefits – Our competitive Total Rewards program offers benefits options like 401K match, paid time off and education assistance that align with your needs and priorities, no matter what life stage you’re in.Diversity, Equity and Inclusion Commitment – We’re committed to ensuring you have a voice that is heard regardless of role, race, gender, religion, or sexual orientation.Development – We believe equipping you with support and development opportunities is an essential part of delivering a remarkable employment experience.Community Involvement – Be an essential part of our core purpose—to improve the health of the people and communities we serve.

Visit us at UnityPoint.org/careers to hear more from our team members about why UnityPoint Health is a great place to work. https://dayinthelife.unitypoint.org

Responsibilities

Able to use ladders to clean light fixtures, vents, and change cubicle curtainsVacuuming Able to operate walk behind or riding floor scrubberSweeping, dry or wet mopping public and private areasProper high and low dusting Taking proper care of department equipment, cleaning EVS cleaning carts, equipment & closets and insuring they are stocked properly

Qualifications

Minimum Requirements

Identify items that are minimally required to perform the essential functions of this position.

Preferred Or Specialized

Not required to perform the essential functions of the position.

Education:

Experience:

Environmental Service training and / or experience in a patient setting and/or Customer Service preferred, not required

License(s)/Certification(s):

Knowledge/Skills/Abilities:

Knowledge:

Skills:

Abilities:

Must have knowledge of environmental duties and responsibilities. Be able to accept, demonstrate, and perform new responsibilities assigned to the Environmental Service Department. Must be able to exhibit tact, good judgment, honesty, and a high sense of responsibility when dealing with guests and peers. Must be able to comprehend written communication to complete daily work assignments. Must be able to complete daily work reports for completed assignments. Must be able to read, speak and understand English to use chemicals and to communicate with customers. Must be able to operate hospital computer. Must be able to use a ladder.

Other:

Use of usual and customary equipment used to perform essential functions of the position.

Area of Interest: Support Services;FTE/Hours per pay period: 1.0;Department: Environmental Services;Shift: 1st shift, 6:30 AM to 3:00 PM;Job ID: 147610;

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
